channel.title: Lmao someone who doesnt know anything
channel.description:
Rofl this guy wanted me to send him something over msn ad he didn't even click accept and he says his norton says it has a trojan lmao. Heres chat logs:
(2:29 PM) hippies good: it seems odlyy (2:31 PM) hippies good: my norton says theres a trojan on it (2:31 PM) **me**: It cant even detect a virus because you didn't click accept yet. (2:31 PM) hippies good: so you admit it (2:34 PM) **me**: lmao Yeah i put a trojan in it. Your funny. (2:34 PM) hippies good: yea (2:35 PM) hippies good: bc a virus master would knoww (2:35 PM) hippies good: thats why i said send thru email (2:35 PM) hippies good: i dont trust ne1111111 (2:35 PM) hippies good: but if ur scared to send thru email.. (2:35 PM) hippies good: what is there to hide?
This guy obviously knows nothing but tries to act like it. :D

item.title: Lmao someone who doesnt know anything
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:6, topic:18732”]Yeh, Norton is so gay, no way would I use it!

[me=Mr.Chris]deletes his Norton Anti-Virus[/me][/quote]yay my new sig

Read full topic

item.title: Lmao someone who doesnt know anything
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:10, topic:18732”]Expect the unexpected when talking to noobs.

Oh well, nothing wrong with being really careful, especially when it comes from people on rs forums. I mean, obviously he doesn’t know anything, but his paranoia may just save his ass someday.[/quote]
Glad you came back JME! and i agree.

Read full topic
